metadata.title: CVE-2024-21490 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: This affects versions of the package angular from 1.3.0. A regularexpression used to split the value of the ng-srcset directive is vulnerableto super-linear runtime due to backtracking. With a large carefully-craftedinput, this can result in catastrophic backtracking and cause a denial ofservice. **Note:** This package is EOL and will not receive any updatesto address this issue. Users should migrate to[@angular/core](https://www.npmjs.com/package/@angular/core).

criterions.comment: angular.js: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
